mapper.select:
SELECT mem.mem_name , mem.mem_memcode , mem.mem_socialnum,mem.mem_phone FROM MKS_MEMBER mem , MKS_HISTORY his WHERE mem.mem_memcode = his.mem_memcode
AND his.hp_code=#{hp_code}
SELECT b.board_no, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_title, b.board_file, o.dept_name FROM mks_board b, mks_online o WHERE b.mks_id = o.mks_id
